pages.text: $(item)Item Frames$() have a few new ways of being displayed.$(br2)First off, you can place the frames in the ceiling and floor now. You may also dye the frames in any of the 16 colors.$(br2)Additionally, a $(item)Glass Item Frame$() can be crafted, which shows only the item. If you place a banner in it, it'll even double as wallpaper!
